http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif CETL-NETWORK List CETL-NETWORK List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=CETL-NETWORK&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=CETL-NETWORK.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-20T12:03:23Z Moss, Karen 2015-02-20T12:02:34+00:00 2015-02-20T12:02:34+00:00 First call for Variety in Chemistry Education / Physics Higher Education Conference 2015- diary date https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;f6f38bcd.1502 First announcement:<br><br>Variety in Chemistry Education / Physics Higher Education Conference 2015<br><br>20st -21th August 2015<br><br>At the University of Nottingham<br><br>A friendly, inclusive and informal meeting where participants share evidence-based practice in teaching physics and chemistry, discuss innovative approaches and explore pedagogic research.<br><br>Oral presentations, short oral bites and workshops will be available.<br><br>Invitations to contribute and the conference website coming soon.... so whether you are an 'old hand' or new to the area -save the date! [...] HEALEY, Mick (Prof) 2015-02-11T15:06:41+00:00 2015-02-11T15:06:41+00:00 Last chance to apply to participate in International Collaborative Writing Groups 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;479bd254.1502 Apologies for cross-posting<br>International Collaborative Writing Groups 2015 (ICWG2015)<br>Applications to participate in ICWG2015 in connection with the International Society for the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning close on 13 March 2015. Apply at: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/ICWG_apply<br>As part of the ISSOTL 2015 Conference<http://www.issotl2015.com.au/> hosted in Melbourne Australia, colleagues are invited to apply to participate in a year-long international collaborative writing group.<br>There will be eight groups, each of which will prepare and write an article during 2015-16 on a pre-selected topic about SOTL (the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) for submission for publication. Each group will have seven members chaired by [...] HEALEY, Mick (Prof) 2015-01-19T14:40:31+00:00 2015-01-19T14:40:31+00:00 Employment opportunities at The University of Queensland (UQ) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;2e3d33aa.1501 Apologies for cross-posting<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>Kelly Matthews (UQ) asked me to circulate this opportunity.<br><br>UQ is a great place to work \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd I was a visiting professor there for four years and will be returning in Oct 2015; the St Lucia campus is lovely.<br><br>Deputy Director of Institute for Teaching and Learning Innovation (ITaLI) and Professor of Higher Education<br>The role [...] HEALEY, Mick (Prof) 2014-11-10T13:43:28+00:00 2014-11-10T13:43:28+00:00 International Collaborative Writing Groups 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;5638d1e6.1411 Apologies for cross-posting<br>International Collaborative Writing Groups 2015 (ICWG2015)<br>As part of the ISSOTL 2015 Conference<http://www.issotl2015.com.au/> hosted in Melbourne Australia, colleagues are invited to apply to participate in a year-long international collaborative writing group.<br>There will be eight groups, each of which will prepare and write an article during 2015-16 on a pre-selected topic about SOTL (the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) for submission for publication. Each group will have seven members chaired by a facilitator familiar with the chosen topic. Ideally each group will include at least one student member.<br>The groups will work at a distance to prepare [...] Moss, Karen 2014-10-10T12:55:37+00:00 2014-10-10T12:55:37+00:00 Last chance to book your place for ITAG14 : Interactive Technologies and Games for Education, Health and Disability https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;3a5012aa.1410 Last chance to book for ITAG14 : Interactive Technologies and Games for Education, Health and Disability Conference<br><br>[http://www.ntu.ac.uk/styles/version_1_0_2/background-images/NTUlogo.jpg]<http://www.ntu.ac.uk/><br><br>[ITAG]<http://itag.gamecity.org/><br><br>ITAG Conference<br>Thursday 16 - Friday 17 October 2014<br><br>With only a week to go until the ITAG conference<http://itag.gamecity.org/> opens for the seventh consecutive year, the ITAG team are working with academics and practitioners to bring you the latest interactive technologies which are driving innovative developments within Education, Health and Disability. [...] HEALEY, Mick (Prof) 2014-09-29T12:53:36+00:00 2014-09-29T12:53:36+00:00 FW: Principal and Senior Teaching Fellow posts at University College London, UK https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;96f0eb8b.1409 Apologies for cross posting<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br>Dilly has asked me to forward this to the list.<br><br>Best wishes<br>Mick<br><br>We\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdre very keen to appoint to two permanent positions in the Centre for the Advancement of Learning and Teaching (CALT) here at UCL \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd A Principal Teaching Fellow and a Senior Teaching Fellow.<br><br>Both posts are linked to the implementation of our major \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdConnected Curriculum\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd initiative, which is an integral part of our Institutional Strategy till 2034: [...] Moss, Karen 2014-09-11T20:21:58+00:00 2014-09-11T20:21:58+00:00 FW: ITAG14: Interactive Technologies and Games Conference - Final Call for bookings - 16th & 17th October 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CETL-NETWORK;dd0b9eb2.1409 Final Call to attend ITAG14: Interactive Technologies and Games Conference - 16th & 17th October 2014 at NTU<br><br>[cid:image003.png@01CFCE06.68231910]<br>More details at conference website http://itag.gamecity.org/<br><br>Book on-line at www.ntu.ac.uk/itagregistration<http://www.ntu.ac.uk/itagregistration><br><br>Dr Karen Moss<br>Director of the Centre for Effective Learning in Science (CELS)<br>& Reader In Science Education<br>School of Science & Technology<br>Nottingham Trent University<br>Clifton Lane<br>Nottingham, NG11 8NS<br>Phone 0115 848 8063<br>web site www.ntu.ac.uk/cels<http://.awxycry0gilj5w/cels> [...]
